item.title: Rupee hits all-time low to 88.33 per US dollar mark amid Trump tariff tensions, FII outflows

review.headline_rewrite: Rupee hits all-time low to 88.33 per US dollar mark amid Trump tariff tensions, FII outflows
bullets: Rupee vs Dollar: The Indian rupee slipped to a new record low on Monday, driven by heavy hedging from importers and a rise in
Rupee weakened to 88.33 against the U.S.
Analysts noted that this decline continued the pressure observed late last week.

item.title: Nifty 50 slips for 2nd straight month in August: 5 key reasons explained why this could be an opportunity to buy stocks

review.headline_rewrite: Nifty 50 slips for 2nd straight month in August: 5 key reasons explained why this could be an opportunity to buy stocks
bullets: Heightened worries over Trump tariffs, sustained selling by foreign institutional investors (FIIs), and stretched valuations amid weak earnings dragged the Indian stock market benchmarks,
The Sensex lost 1.7 per cent last month after a nearly 3 per cent cut in July.
The Nifty ended the month with a loss of 1.4 per cent after a 3 per cent fall in the previous month.
India's gross domestic product (GDP) grew at a solid pace of 7.8 per cent in the April-June quarter of FY26 (Q1FY26).

item.title: Semiconductor company Tessolve raises $150 mn from TPG

review.headline_rewrite: Semiconductor company Tessolve raises $150 mn from TPG
bullets: Tessolve claims to have scaled up revenues from $25 million in FY16 to over $150 million in FY25.

item.title: Greenzo Energy wins green hydrogen plant order from Jindal Stainless

review.headline_rewrite: Greenzo Energy wins green hydrogen plant order from Jindal Stainless
bullets: Greenzo Energy India Limited has secured an order from Jindal Stainless Limited (JSL) to supply and commission a green hydrogen electrolyser plant at JSLâ€™s
The plant will have a designed capacity of 472,409 kg per year and is scheduled for delivery within six months of contract signing.
The electrolyser system features indigenous alkaline bipolar technology delivering hydrogen at 30 bar pressure with 99.99999 per cent purity.
